name: GTA V
snippet: Los Santos is a sprawling sun-soaked metropolis full of self-help gurus, starlets and once-important stars.

name: Dark Souls
snippet: Project Dark (Working Title) is a brand new dark fantasy RPG designed to completely embrace the concepts of tension in dungeon exploration, fear in encountering enemies, the joy of new discoveries, and a high sense of achievement in progressing.

name: Lords of Fallen
snippet: Lords of the Fallen is a hardcore action-RPG featuring an advanced combat systems and robust class skill trees.

name: Assassin Creed 3
snippet: Assume the role of Connor, the son of a Native American mother and English father.

name: Forza Motorsport 5
snippet: By learning how you and your compatriots drive, the utility of the cloud delivers real human behavior.
